moderate.known: You shouldn't worry if it's not like that
moderate.target: 你不应该担心如果它不是那样的
moderate.issue: "worry if" is awkward; better: "worry about whether" or "worry that"

moderate.known: I'm trying to hear you say this
moderate.issue: 试图听 + person + verb is awkward; better: 想听, 试着听, or 努力听

moderate.known: We're not trying to hear you say that
moderate.target: 我们不是在试图听你说那样的
moderate.issue: 试图听 + person + verb is awkward; better: 想听, 试着听, or 努力听

moderate.known: I need a little more time for many more
moderate.target: 我需要多一点时间为了更多的
moderate.issue: 为了更多的 at end is incomplete - needs noun after 的

major.issue: "I'd like this language" is ungrammatical - needs verb (learn/speak/study)
我想这个语言 is wrong - 想 needs a verb phrase or clause, not just noun

major.known: If you think it's not like that
major.target: 如果你想它不是那样的
major.issue: 想 (want) should be 认为/觉得 (think) when followed by clause

major.known: We're trying to say many more about this
major.target: 我们正在试图说更多的关于这
major.issue: "many more" without noun is incomplete or awkward

major.known: I'm enjoying finding out many more about what we're doing
major.target: 我很享受了解更多的关于我们正在做的
major.issue: "many more" without noun is incomplete or awkward
